markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait can be one of several kinds of creature, including [goblins](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), [hobgoblins](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=13), and [bugbears](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=17). Goblins tend to have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415). An ability with this trait can be used or chosen only by goblins. A weapon with this trait is created and used by goblins.
name: Goblin

text: Goblin Source Core Rulebook pg. 632 4.0 A creature with this trait can be one of several kinds of creature, including goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears. Goblins tend to have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or chosen only by goblins. A weapon with this trait is created and used by goblins.
